title: Xayah and Rakan icons
body: Are the Icons still being passed out, I gifted a friend on the 23rd and don't have it yet

replies.body: The icon distribution has just about ended, but it looks like it might have missed your account. Check your summoner icons now ^_^!
It seemed to have missed mine too for some apparent reason?
A poro with a mustache told me here is where we come if we didn't get the icon.

Oooooo that sounds like one handsome poro!! 

Check for that icon now before some mustachioed poro get's his eyes on it!

I actually am missing the icon you get for playing two games as Rakan/Xayah on the Rift (the one with their foreheads almost touching).  Is this the right thread for that, too?

EDIT: I do know it's two games as either with a teammate playing the other.  I played a good handful of SR matches as a Rakan/Xayah bot duo during the promotional period.
The one with the foreheads touching is from gifting to someone rakan/xayah (and the one people ask in this thread)
I did that, too.  I did all the things necessary to get all three icons, but the one of them touching foreheads has yet to appear.
Then you are in the right place, and by looking at boards, it seems a lot of people didn't get this icon.
Thanks Broporo and mysterious  talking mustached poro.
Strange, I too ran across this mustachioed poro. Is it possible to get the icon for gifting Rakan to my friend during the event? It hasn't arrived yet.
Same goes for me, won 2 games playing duo rakhan/Xayah in Coops vs IA on summoners' Rift, I only got the icon for gifting the champ :/
It also might have missed my account... >.<{{item:3070}}

i know many people is asking for the icon and i haven't got my either. Did it mess up or something? (Sorry for asking)

Edit:  got mine today thanks :)
Yeah I'm still missing mine as well. i gifted Xayah on the 24th so i should have it yes?
I have not got mine either...
